characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: When a unit of Chaos Spawn makes its close combat attacks, roll a D3 and consult the table below.   1: Razor Claws: The hideous mutations of all Chaos Spawn in the unit have an AP of -4 until the end of the Fight phase. 2: Grasping Pseudopods: Each Chaos Spawn in the unit adds 2 to its Attacks characteristic until the end of the Fight phase. 3: Toxic Haemorrhage: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this unit until the end of the Fight phase.
